Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) thin films were fabricated by slurry spin coating on NiO-YSZ anode substrates.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of anode-supported YSZ films by slurry spin coating

Sentencas: The effect of processing factors, such as the baking temperature and spinning number was investigated and discussed.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of anode-supported YSZ films by slurry spin coating

Sentencas: According to the thermogravimetric analysis, the organic additives could be removed by baking at 400 degrees C for 10 min.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of anode-supported YSZ films by slurry spin coating

Sentencas: Under this heating condition for each coating, the defects in the electrolyte film could be repaired by repetitive coating.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of anode-supported YSZ films by slurry spin coating

Sentencas: Dense and crack-free electrolyte films were consequently obtained.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of anode-supported YSZ films by slurry spin coating

Sentencas: When dry hydrogen was used as the fuel and the stationary air as the oxidant, a single cell based on a 14-mu m-thick YSZ film produced open-circuit voltages (OCVs) of > 1.10 V in all of the operating temperatures (500-700 degrees C).
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of anode-supported YSZ films by slurry spin coating

Sentencas: The cell exhibited maximum power densities of 634, 493 and 316 mW/cm(2) at 700, 650 and 600 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of anode-supported YSZ films by slurry spin coating

Sentencas: By using pure oxygen at a flow rate of 100 mL/min, the maximum power density increased to 658 mW/cm(2) at 650 degrees C. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of anode-supported YSZ films by slurry spin coating
